name: 10 By 10
headline: 10by10 is a unique marketplace in the recruiting agency industry for√¢¬Ä¬¶
description: 10by10 is a marketplace to instantly match qualified candidates with companies by pooling candidates across recruitment agencies. Check out the testimonials on our website (www.10by10.io).

founders.name: April Chang, Founder/CEO
founders.description:
What is 10x10? It's our commitment to revolutionizing hiring√¢¬Ä¬î10x better, 10x faster. Our hard work turned a slogan into reality: connected 80 senior engineers with a startup in only 2 weeks, with 10 in final interviews by week 3!

Flexport, Front, Grammarly, Iterable, Monte Carlo, Niantic, Otter.ai, Plaid, and 200+ trust 10by10 to hire the best talent fast. 

April has an extensive engineering background, serving as the Head of Payments at PayPal and VP of Engineering at both Eventbrite.

## Hire the best tech talent, 10x faster
AI automation with a human touch
[ START HIRING NOW ](https://10by10.io/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6IjI2MzYiLCJ0b2dnbGUiOmZhbHNlfQ%3D%3D>)
_No upfront cost. Same day setup_
Trusted by Hundreds of Companies 
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/DESKTOP-Logo-Set-1-e1571266677206.png)
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/TABLET-Logo-Set-1-min-e1571266719688.png)
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/MOBILE-Logo-Set-1-e1571266607730.png)
Trusted by Hundreds of Companies 
## How 10x10 Works For You
  * AI Automation


Our software analyzes your job requirements and identifies candidates unreachable on job boards and social media. 
  * Human Touch


Reach beyond your network, 10√ó10 reaches a large pool of qualified candidates aggregated from the best recruiting agencies. 
  * Quality & Speed


Only qualified and interested candidates presented. Companies interview over 70% of our candidates (3.5x better than industry average).
_Are you a top tech recruiter?[**Apply Here**](https://10by10.io/<https:/www.10by10.io/contact/>)_
## We Make Hiring 10x Easier And 10x Faster
Trusted by Hundreds of Companies 
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/jzquzfnitew8sihggsuv.png)
I‚Äôve worked with some great technical recruiters but 10x10 went above and beyond in helping to source and close quality candidates. They helped us navigate tricky candidate timelines and collaborated on high-touch closing strategies to make a successful hire together. 10x10 brings the quality and delight to the challenging hiring environment in Silicon Valley. 
![Bruno Faviero, Co-founder & COO, Seed](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/1_RrQYFnZaufZEaHJyL1yYDw-scaled-e1592445134338.jpeg)
Bruno Faviero, Co-founder & COO, SeedEngineer Placement
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/download.png)
10x10 was recommended to us by one of our investors and I am so glad that I gave them a try. They provide a one-stop shop to access a wide range of top candidates across the US and provide us a curated list of highly qualified candidates who are interested in joining our founding team. They nailed it and helped us hire a top notch engineer in a month! I look forward to continuing our partnership with them to grow our team and am happy to endorse their service. [_**Watch video**_](https://10by10.io/<https:/vimeo.com/423453575>)
![Barr Moses, Co-founder & CEO, Series A](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/IMG_1531-scaled-e1582164026362.jpg)
Barr Moses, Co-founder & CEO, Series A6 Placements
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Yota-e1582079743368.png)
Finding high-caliber technical talent has been a huge challenge. 10x10 is a pleasure to work with and we are very happy with the engineers they helped us find and hire. Their magic sauce of combining AI with an army of human recruiters delivers standout candidates that sets them apart from the traditional recruiting solutions.[_**Watch video**_](https://10by10.io/<https:/vimeo.com/423450697>)
![Basil Hashem, VP Product Development, Series A](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Basil-Hashem-2019-WithJacket-CloseCrop-scaled.jpg)
Basil Hashem, VP Product Development, Series A4 Placements
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/OuUrrEqX_400x400.png)
We had been looking for engineers with very specific skills because we work in the blockchain space and we have a very high bar for recruiting. I looked for several months for candidates with no success, using varied approaches from sourcing myself to talking to recruiters. I worked with 10x10 for about a month and hired two engineers. These engineers are working out great! They're rock stars and I'm really happy to have them on the team. I highly recommend using 10x10 - super effective. [_**Watch video**_](https://10by10.io/<https:/vimeo.com/422675834>)
![Peter DePaulo, Head of Developer Experience, Series A](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/download-1.jpeg)
Peter DePaulo, Head of Developer Experience, Series A2 Placements
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/distru-logo-with-text.png)
What has surprised me the most is 10x10‚Äôs technical expertise - We have a very high technical bar and they understood all my feedback and more importantly they acted on them right away. I felt that throughout this entire process they were my partners, not just someone trying to make a hire. I can't recommend them enough to anybody looking for recruiters that both understand your problems technically and are willing to help you improve processes. Thank you team 10x10! [_**Watch video**_](https://10by10.io/<https:/vimeo.com/422673041>)
![Johnny Ji, CTO, Seed](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/951052-large-e1590541975920.jpeg)
Johnny Ji, CTO, SeedEngineer Placement
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/download.jpeg)
The team at 10by10 are great. They helped Flock Freight close several critical, highly technical, difficult to fill positions. Quality candidates, quality service, and exceptional market expertise - these folks get it! 
![Darin Matuzic, Recruiting Manager, Series C](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/140793-medium_jpg.jpeg)
Darin Matuzic, Recruiting Manager, Series C3 Placements
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/Panther_Labs_Logo-scaled.jpg)
10x10 helped Panther scale its engineering team during the pandemic, finding high quality candidates at a time when the market was at its hottest. 10x10 took the time to understand roles, requirements, and our interview process, and seamlessly integrated with our team. 
![Joren McReynolds, VP of Engineering, Series A](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/1557864551080.jpeg)
Joren McReynolds, VP of Engineering, Series A3 Placements
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/download.png)
10x10 was recommended by the lead investor in our seed round, and we are so glad they did. We had very specific ideas about the engineers and designers we were seeking and 10x10 not only found us candidates but really worked to understand the specific qualifications and aesthetics that were crucial in these key hires. 10x10 was our partner through a rigorous candidate screening process and we're happy to announce that they filled ALL the open roles we had. We strongly recommend the 10x10 team. 
![Steven Puri, Founder & Chief Strategy Officer, Seed](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/zilo-790.jpg)
Steven Puri, Founder & Chief Strategy Officer, Seed6 Placements
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/5ff625defc6855b48719f890_Combo-Logo_Gradient_Padded.png)
10x10 was referred to us as the go-to recruiting service for startups and they delivered! We hired 2 top-notch marketers within 2 months in today‚Äôs competitive market. They partner with a large network of recruiters across the US and introduced us to great candidates outside of our referral network. 
![Carl Liu, Co-founder, Seed](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/05/zy5Oi6qS_400x400.jpeg)
Carl Liu, Co-founder, Seed2 Placements
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Iterable@2x.png)
10x10 was referred to us by another recruiter and we are so glad we found them. They only send us qualified candidates and we chose over 90% of them to interview. We very much appreciate their partnership in hiring a highly sought after senior engineer with many competing offers. 
![Melanie Graf, Director of Talent Acquisition, Series D](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/0-e1571263539508.jpg)
Melanie Graf, Director of Talent Acquisition, Series D6 Placements
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/download.png)
10x10 has built an impressive service. They turn up great candidates -- a difficult task in mobile robotics, the small and specialized labor market we compete in. They take the time to understand what we need and consistently present us with appealing candidates, several of whom we've hired. 10x10 is attentive, efficient, and effective -- a pleasure to work with.
![Bob Hall, COO, Series A](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Bob-e1589038373925.jpeg)
Bob Hall, COO, Series ARobotic Engineer Placements
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Screen-Shot-2020-02-21-at-5.18.17-PM.png)
Hiring top tier engineering talent is a battle in today‚Äôs competitive market and we are glad to be able to tap into 10x10‚Äôs deep network of the best recruiters. We had very specific technical requirements and a high bar for our engineering candidates. 10x10 was able to understand our requirements, quickly build a pipeline and refine it effectively based on our feedback. As a result, we were able to close our first great engineer within a month. 10x10 excels in having introductory conversations with candidates, helping with scheduling, following up and closing the candidates. This saves us founders a lot of time.
![Nilesh Dalvi, Co-founder, Seed](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/download.jpeg)
Nilesh Dalvi, Co-founder, Seed2 Placements
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Epic@2x.png)
10√ó10‚Äôs quality and speed are outstanding, setting a very high bar for all hiring solutions. In one month, I‚Äôve interviewed over 90% of the great candidates they shared. We‚Äôve made three successful hires with their help.
![Suren Markosian, CEO, Series C](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Suren_Markosian_owler_20190130_132315_original-e1582150444655.png)
Suren Markosian, CEO, Series C5 Placements
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/Strive.png)
The team at 10√ó10 spent time to really understand my role and requirements. We hired a near impossible to fill Head of Engineering through them, and would strongly recommend other companies work with them too!
![Will Houghteling, CEO, Seed](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/Capture.png)
Will Houghteling, CEO, SeedHead of Engineering Placement
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/dexcithlryrr56lqcicn.png)
I'm very pleased that we hired a top-notch senior engineer in only 3 weeks of working together. You have definitely exceeded my expectations and have done substantially better than the other agencies. Great work! üôÇ 
![Samik Bhowal, VP of Engineering, Series B](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/0_WoSVaV3Ha-zbxP5O-e1592444821581.jpeg)
Samik Bhowal, VP of Engineering, Series BEngineer Placement
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/jzquzfnitew8sihggsuv.png)
I‚Äôve worked with some great technical recruiters but 10x10 went above and beyond in helping to source and close quality candidates. They helped us navigate tricky candidate timelines and collaborated on high-touch closing strategies to make a successful hire together. 10x10 brings the quality and delight to the challenging hiring environment in Silicon Valley. 
![Bruno Faviero, Co-founder & COO, Seed](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/1_RrQYFnZaufZEaHJyL1yYDw-scaled-e1592445134338.jpeg)
Bruno Faviero, Co-founder & COO, SeedEngineer Placement
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/download.png)
10x10 was recommended to us by one of our investors and I am so glad that I gave them a try. They provide a one-stop shop to access a wide range of top candidates across the US and provide us a curated list of highly qualified candidates who are interested in joining our founding team. They nailed it and helped us hire a top notch engineer in a month! I look forward to continuing our partnership with them to grow our team and am happy to endorse their service. [_**Watch video**_](https://10by10.io/<https:/vimeo.com/423453575>)
![Barr Moses, Co-founder & CEO, Series A](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/IMG_1531-scaled-e1582164026362.jpg)
Barr Moses, Co-founder & CEO, Series A6 Placements
## START HIRING TODAY
Same day fast setup
Email 
GET STARTED
## Created by Engineers to Hire The Best Engineers
Our founding team are all ex-CTO‚Äôs and VPE‚Äôs of tech companies who‚Äôve hired 1000+ engineers 
## 70%
candidateprogression
70% of all candidates we submit to our clients go through their interview process.
70% of all candidates we submit to our clients go through their interview process.
## 100+
tech recruiters 
Invite-only and individually vetted top Bay Area tech recruiters on our platform
Invite-only and individually vetted top Bay Area tech recruiters on our platform
## $$$$
Absolutely free to use. Only pay when a hire is made.
Absolutely free to use. Only pay when a hire is made.
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2018/04/Copy-of-AprilHeadShot-e1571434939277.jpg)
Going through a period of hyper-growth is exciting but exhausting at the same time, It‚Äôs crazy hard to hire fast while maintaining quality. It‚Äôs getting even harder in today‚Äôs candidate‚Äôs market. I like to share my experience of hiring 1000s engineers at both public companies and startups to help you hire the top talent you deserve 10 times easier and 10 times faster. 
95% of the qualified candidates are not looking for jobs and won‚Äôt apply to your job postings. Let our AI help you discover your future employees. We know you are busy and our high touch human recruiters will pitch your jobs and follow up with candidates through out the interview process for you to maximize your hiring success.
‚ÄîApril Chang, Founder
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/e-svg.png)
### VP of Engineering Eventbrite
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/style-svg.png)
### VP of Engineering StyleSeat
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/paypal-svg.png)

![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/2-1.png)
### Sr. Engineering Director Yahoo!
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/e-svg.png)
VP of Engineering Eventbrite​
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/paypal-svg.png)
Sr. Engineering Director Paypal
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/style-svg.png)
VP of Engineering StyleSeat
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/2.png)
Ex Sr. Engineering Director Yahoo! 
## Hire Candidates From 
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/DESKTOP-Logo-Set-2.png)
![](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/MOBILE-Logo-Set-2.png)
## Access Hundreds of Recruiting Agencies Networks
10√ó10 hand selects and vets all agencies to ensure we have the top 10% of tech recruiters.
We have had the pleasure of working with 10√ó10 this past year and made several placements. Their professionalism, experience, and knowledge of Silicon Valley has made our relationship a great collaboration. With our partnership, we have changed both the lives of the candidates we placed and the companies we serve. We look forward to continuing a long lasting relationship!
![Ryan, Founder & CEO](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/black-and-white-boy-casual-555790-e1571263436165.jpg)
Ryan, Founder & CEO6 Placements
You get a high ratio of submittals to placement because 10x10 partners closely with employers to provide recruiters with clear job requirements for clients my candidates are excited to interview with. Their AI technology uncovers your existing candidates that match new job orders automatically and creates additional passive income opportunities for me. I‚Äôm very impressed with 10x10, and the feedback I hear from my placed candidates tells me that their employer clients feel the same! 
![Tangerine Search](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/IMG_1104-2-e1619124701981.jpeg)
Tangerine Search2 placements
Working with the team at 10by10.io has been a great experience! April and her team have been nothing short of amazing in terms of the wide variety of roles on which to work, their outstanding communication, transparency and commitment to everyone‚Äôs success. As a seasoned Executive Search Recruiter, I‚Äôve worked with many teams. April‚Äôs is by far the best. So good in fact, I made a lucrative placement in the first six weeks of my partnership with them.
![Kelly Nelson, MA, Owner](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/kellynelson.png)
Kelly Nelson, MA, Owner1 placement
In just a few months, we‚Äôve already made three placements. Our candidates were thankful they had the opportunity to be introduced to additional clients, and are very happy in the jobs they landed. The team at 10√ó10 has been a pleasure to work with. They are incredibly knowledgeable about their clients, professional, and responsive. We look forward to many more placements.
![Anne, Founder](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/3-4.png)
Anne, Founder5 placements
10by10 has opened up my business to a number of new reqs, many of which I already had perfect candidates in mind for right off the bat. I've been able to make placements due to the speed and attentiveness to the 10by10.io team. I'm looking forward to growing and shifting more of my recruitment efforts to the 10by10 platform. 10by10 platform provides all the information needs to hit the ground running and is very easy to use.
![Michele Snethkamp, Independent Tech Recruiter](https://www.10by10.io/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/5b02df747b9a8c043be0792f_PROFILE-e1582348631483.jpg)
Michele Snethkamp, Independent Tech Recruiter1 placement
We have had the pleasure of working with 10√ó10 this past year and made several placements. Their professionalism, experience, and knowledge of Silicon Valley has made our relationship a great collaboration. With our partnership, we have changed both the lives of the candidates we placed and the companies we serve. We look forward to continuing a long lasting relationship!

generated_description:
### 10 By 10: Revolutionizing Recruitment with 10x Efficiency

**Company Overview:**
10 By 10 is a fresh take on talent acquisition, designed to streamline the hiring process for tech companies. Founded during Y Combinator's Batch S17 and headquartered in San Francisco, it stands out in the crowded recruiting agency landscape by leveraging AI alongside human expertise. With a nimble team of five, they precisely cater to the needs of employers and candidates alike through a unique marketplace model.

**Mission:**
The core mission of 10 By 10 is to create an impeccable marketplace that connects companies with qualified candidates faster than ever. By aggregating talent from a wide network of recruiting agencies, they ensure employers find the right fit without the cumbersome wait typically associated with hiring.

**How It Works:**
10 By 10 offers an innovative fusion of AI technology and personalized recruiter support. Here‚Äôs the breakdown:
- **AI Automation:** Their software quickly analyzes job requirements, uncovering candidates that traditional job boards and social platforms may miss.
- **Human Touch:** Recruiters extend the network reach by aggregating candidates' data from various agencies, giving employers access to a broader talent pool. 
- **Quality & Speed:** They boast a 70% candidate progression rate‚Äîsubstantially above the industry standard‚Äîmeaning employers interview a majority of the candidates presented to them.

**User Experience:**
Engaging with 10 By 10 entails no upfront costs, and clients only pay when a hire is successfully made. The platform promises same-day setup, making it an appealing option for companies needing to ramp up their teams rapidly.

**Client Testimonials:**
The effectiveness of 10 By 10 is illustrated through a multitude of client testimonials claiming that the service outperforms traditional recruiting strategies. Users report making rapid, quality placements, significantly easing their hiring burdens. This credibility is earned not just through speed but also through a dedicated follow-up process that emphasizes candidate fit and satisfaction.

**The Bigger Picture:**
For startups and tech companies navigating the fierce talent market, 10 By 10 is much more than just a service‚Äîit's a partnership aimed at achieving sustainable growth. With a diverse array of talent pools and backed by seasoned industry veterans, 10 By 10 empowers both candidates and companies during the recruitment journey.

**Website & Contact:**
For those interested in transforming their hiring approach, more information can be found on their website [10 By 10](https://10by10.io). Whether you're looking to fill a position efficiently or want to learn about becoming a part of their recruiting network, 10 By 10 is poised to reshape your perspective on recruitment.

In an age where speed and quality are paramount, 10 By 10 is here to redefine how we think about hiring in the tech industry. 

### Summary:
In a nutshell, 10 By 10 combines cutting-edge technology with human insight, significantly reducing the time and effort involved in recruitment. Their unique approach not only fills open positions more efficiently but also fosters a quality-driven hiring environment that benefits both employers and candidates.
